name: SecuROM Analysis File
summary: File created by SecuROM, a CD/DVD-ROM copy protection technology; created when the "Launch Analysis" option is chosen after right-clicking a program executable ( .EXE ) or related shortcut that is managed by SecuROM; generates an AnalysisLog.sr0 file in the C:\â€‹ directory or on the user's desktop by default.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
